reviews.text: Aroma: caramel, honey, breadAppearance: color - amber / copper; Liquid - hazy; head: rich, frothy & whiteTaste: same with aroma, taste is caramel, honey & malt, medium sweet, light bitter, not sour, quite umamiPalate: body is between light and medium; texture is thin; carbonation is fizzy; finishing is a little bit sweet and bitterOverall: it is a easy drinkable beer which is not very heavy, its malt and honey aroma and taste are the main characteristics, if its hop can bring more fruity features, it would be a prefer beer in summer

Chocolate and soy sauce aroma, also can feel inside alcohol, sour and Obsolete tasteColor like engine oil, little brown head, canât see the bubblesChocolate, smoke and soy sauceâs salty taste in the mouth, tongue can feel a few bubbles. Sour and chocolateâs bitter, little bit sweet aftertaste.Body is not too heavy for imperial stoutQuite good but not the best
